sen.j: 澤村 藤十郎（さわむら とうじゅうろう）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡。
sen.e: Tojuro SAWAMURA is a professional name of kabuki actor.
Tojuro SAWAMURA is a professional name of Kabuki actors.

sen.j: 屋号は紀伊國屋 (歌舞伎)。
sen.e: Its stage family name is Kinokuniya (Kabuki).

sen.j: 定紋は笹竜胆（ささりんどう）。
sen.e: Its Jomon (family crest) is sasa-rindo (bamboo grass and gentians).
